design of a separable transition-diagram compiler*a cobol compiler design is presented which iscompact enough to permit rapid one-pass compilation of a large subset of cobol on a moderately large computer versions of the same compiler for smaller machines require only two working tapes plus a compilertape the methods given are largely applicable to the construction of algol compilers.cacm july
